mapper.insert: insert supplier_commodity_tmp ( supplier_id, code, code69, inventory, measure_spec_id, rule_val, unit_id, price, unit_price, min_img, created_at, updated_at, created_by, updated_by, deleted, status, remark, tag_id, sku, min_order_quantity, sca_id )VALUES ( #{supplierId}, #{code}, #{code69}, #{inventory}, #{measureSpecId}, #{ruleVal}, #{unitId}, #{price}, #{unitPrice}, #{minImg}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt}, #{createdBy}, #{updatedBy}, #{deleted}, #{status}, #{remark}, #{tagId}, #{sku}, #{minOrderQuantity}, #{scaId} )
